[1] G. Chevalier, Wigner's theorem and its generalizations, Handbook of Quantum Logic and Quantum Structures, 429- 475, Elsevier, 2007. [2] W- L. Chow, On the geometry of algebraic homogeneous spaces, Ann. of Math. 50(1949), 32- 67. [3] J. Dieudonné, La géométrie des groupes classiques (2nd edition), Springer, 1963. [4] G.P. Gehér, P. Šemrl, Isometries of Grassmann spaces, J. Funct. Anal. 270 (2016), 1585- 1601. [5] G.P. Gehér, Wigner's theorem on Grassmann spaces, J. Funct. Anal. 273(2017), 2994- 3001. [6] G.P. Gehér, Symmetries of projective spaces and spheres. Int. Math. Res. Not. IMRN 2020, no. 7, 2205- 2240. [7] G.P. Gehér, M. Mori, The structure of maps on the space of all quantum pure states that preserve a fixed quantum angle, Int. Math. Res. Not. 2022, no. 16, 12003- 12029. [8] G.P. Gehér, Wigner- type theorems for Albert Grassmannians by Mark Pankov (book review), Bull. Amer. Math. Soc. 59(2022), 289- 292.
